overview: Charlie (Curro), a 16 year-old boy, who apparently seeks to stop being a virgin. But he has fallen madly in love with a prostitute ten years older than he. It is difficult for him to approach her, so he decides to pay her for the services and in this way try to fall in love
tagline: A hard look at unnatural love that could happen only in today's "anything goes" lifestyle.
title: Charlie and the Hooker
